verbs.description: [ARG0: sacramento police] [V: crack] down [ARG1: on unsafe driving near school buses] drivers beware starting monday sacramento police are taking part in a weeklong crackdown to remind drivers to stop when a school bus is dropping off students school bus drivers have reported that other drivers are in such a rush to get to work or school that they just are n't being safe around school buses expect to see extra enforcement and officers issuing more tickets to violators it all part of the stop on red campaign officers said modesto california school police stockton sacramento kcra tv modesto sacramento california california kcra school buses stockton california
